channel.title: Full tzhaar minigame?impossible?
channel.description: i would love to have a full working tzhaar minigame. like in real RS start of with the kih's(little bird things...) to the jad(the obviously strongest monster ever created.) i would freak out if somebody told me (if it is possible) seriously huge rep up. (btw how do you make rep you give more the +1?)

item.title: Full tzhaar minigame?impossible?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

[quote=“xx nub xx, post:23, topic:184819”][quote author=openice123 link=topic=246516.msg2077407#msg2077407 date=1204184609]

You have to do most of it yourself, not rely on a development team every time you want to make something.
What’s the point of running a server if it was made completel by someone else?

Well, generally that is true, but not if everyone does equal work, although those development teams don’t exist on these forums (for the most part) and most of em break up within a week or two anyway… I don’t even bother with them seeing as I can get more work done by myself.

same ive never been a groupy person i like doing my work and my own work but will take short cuts some times if my ways dont work
[/quote]

same lol, even in school i don’t like working in groups because alot of the time the groups are awkward and it is hard to get everyone to agree on something. They all have to have it their way or the highway.[/quote]
lol at school when the teacher says you can work with a partner people crowd around me (I AM NOT A NERD! I HAVE HORRIBLE GRADES!!!) so i end up giving them stupid answers like whats 1+1? llama… they get pist off its so funny

Read full topic
